title: Senior Researcher (m/f/d): Innovation, Entrepreneurship and Society
content:
Important note: We are no longer accepting applications for this position. The Alexander von Humboldt Institute for Internet and Society (HIIG) is seeking a postdoctoral researcher to coordinate and further develop its new research focus on “Innovation, Entrepreneurship and Society”. The application process is conducted in German. The review of applications will begin on 10…

The post Senior Researcher (m/f/d): Innovation, Entrepreneurship and Society appeared first on HIIG.
creator: Frederik Efferenn
sourceDescription: Alexander von Humboldt Institute for Internet and Society
